UPDATE tbl_subservicio_ssrv ssrvBl SET ssrv_estado = ( WITH sql AS ( SELECT ssrv_estado FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv ssrvPartEqui WHERE ssrvPartEqui.ssrv_srvc_pk = ssrvBl.ssrv_srvc_pk AND ssrvPartEqui.ssrv_tpss_pk IN (getEntidad('PARTIDA'), getEntidad('EQUIPAMIENTO')) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subservicio_subservicio_ssss WHERE ssss_ssrvp_pk = ssrvBl.ssrv_pk AND ssss_ssrvh_pk = ssrvPartEqui.ssrv_pk ) ) SELECT CASE WHEN 'R' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sql WHERE ssrv_estado NOT IN ('R', 'A') ) THEN 'I'
WHEN 'B' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'B'
WHEN NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sql ) THEN 'S'
WHEN 'A' = ALL (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'A'
ELSE 'X' END ) WHERE ssrv_tpss_pk = getEntidad('BL') AND ssrv_pk = #{value}
